workshop.title: Oracle Analytics Cloud
workshop.description: This workshop provides you with an introduction to the data visualization capabilities included in OAC. Data Visualization (DV) enables you to quickly synthesize a variety of data sources to gain meaningful insights. In this workshop you will learn how to massage and analyze data with the help of custom calculations, advanced filtering, and machine learning.

labs.title: Lab 100: Getting Started with Oracle Analytics Cloud Data Visualization
labs.description: Learning how to provision an OAC instance. Getting acclimatized to the DV interface.

labs.title: Lab 200:  Analyzing Sales - Basic Introduction to Core Features
labs.description: Creating projects with data sets and visualizations. Understanding the visualization capabilities of DV. Telling a story with annotated visualizations.

labs.title: Lab 300:  Analyzing Social Media with Sales – Data Blending and Wrangling
labs.description: Learning to Wrangle Data Sets. Joining Multiple Data Sets for analysis.

labs.title: Lab 400: Analyzing Social Media with Sales – Visualize and Narrate
labs.description: Learning how to use Calculations. Using different visualizations to obtain insights from data set. Narrating a meaningful story using Narrate

labs.title: Lab 500: Predicting Subscriptions - Machine Learning
labs.description: Learning how to create data flows. Using the Machine Learning abilities of OAC.
